summary: This module implements a heterogeneous relational graph convolutional network (RGCN) using DGL and PyTorch to perform node classification on the OGBN-MAG dataset. It defines the model architecture, data preprocessing utilities, and training/evaluation pipelines for benchmarking graph neural network performance on a large academic citation network.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run reference implementation that enables researchers and engineers to train, evaluate, and benchmark relational GCN models on heterogeneous graph data, facilitating development and comparison of graph neural network solutions for node classification tasks.
